Docs.param: The source query.
Docs.summary:
Enumerates the query such that for server queries such as those of ,
, , and others the results of the query will be loaded into the associated
, or other cache on the client. This is equivalent to calling ToList and then throwing away the list without the overhead of actually creating the list.
